attributes.title: ❗️⚠️LOST CAT ALERT⚠️❗️
attributes.review: After 4 hours and 20 minutes of grocery shopping i drove back to my wonderful shack. I was about to take a long nap when i noticed something was off, I looked around the entire 100 square ft shack but i could not find my cat ANYWHERE. It has come to my attention that many others has found their lost pets by leaving a 1 star review on trumps app, so i’m hoping someone will be able to find him after seeing this. My cat is orange, not quite as orange as trump though he’s also quite chunky which coincidently fits trumps description as well. If you find him please message me via @realdonaldtrump

attributes.title: 𝐷𝑂𝑁𝑇 𝐷𝑂𝑊𝑁𝐿𝑂𝐴𝐷 𝑇𝐻𝐼𝑆 𝐴𝑃𝑃 𝑂𝑅 𝑈 𝑊𝐼𝐿𝐿 𝐷𝐼𝐸
attributes.review: I wanted to dowload this app to support the great Orange god his self🍊✨I mean how could u not like his orange tan I will never get a tan great as his,just love how his hair blows in the wind as if it’s just going to fly of.Back to the point, well I pressed download I open the app put my number all of a sudden a random number started blowing up my phone I block the number and carried on, I had this for two days and stuff around my room is weird every night I see little trump ninjas I fought them off,then I see trump at my window lookin a little sad so as the supporter I am I gave him some cookies.Other wise I do not recommend this app or u will get killed by ninjas😊𝑇𝐻𝐴𝑁𝐾 𝑌𝑂𝑈.
